body:
<!--
**PLEASE READ THIS FIRST:**
- Do not use the bug and feature tracker for support requests. Use the `cython-users` mailing list instead.
- Did you search for similar issues already? Please do, it helps to save us precious time that we otherwise could not invest into development.
- Did you try the latest master branch or pre-release? It might already have what you want to report. Also see the [Changelog](https://github.com/cython/cython/blob/master/CHANGES.rst) regarding recent changes.
-->

**Describe the bug**
https://github.com/aws/aws-cli depends on PyYAML, which depends on CPython, unfortunately with the latest minor release, CPython is failing to compile:
```
Collecting Cython
    Downloading https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/d9/cd/0d2d90b27219c07f68f1c25bcc7b02dd27639d2180add9d4b73e70945869/Cython-0.29.23.tar.gz (2.1MB)
  Installing collected packages: setuptools, wheel, Cython

```

As noted in this issue https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/issues/6096, comment https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/issues/6096#issuecomment-820007560:
> It looks like they supplied a wheel (Cython-0.29.22-py2.py3-none-any.whl) in the last release that's platform agnostic. It doesn't appear to be present in the latest release. 

**To Reproduce**
Install awscli or CPython in alpine.

**Expected behavior**
Expected CPython and any dependents to be installed without CPython compilation issues.

**Environment (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Linux Alpine 3.11
 - Python version 2.7.18-r0
 - Cython version: 0.29.23

comment_data.body: I was just trying to find out why a container image that is using PyYaml suddenly stopped building, and reached the same conclusion as @Ranguna.
+1 we have hit the same issue on https://github.com/envoyproxy/envoy CI
I uploaded the missing wheel. Thanks for the reports.
I can confirm that my alpine build is working again as of an hour ago. Thank you.

rename.from: [BUG] 0.29.22 and 0.29.23 fails to install on alpine

title: [BUG] 0.29.23 fails to install on alpine
